businessmodel

Class ProductionScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.ProductionScheduler

  • public class ProductionScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that is responsible for scheduling in orders for an individual day.
    Author:
    Team 10

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AssemblyLine assemblyline
      The AssemblyLine for this Scheduler.

      The number of hours this Scheduler can use today.

      The OrderManager that supplies and manages the orders for this Scheduler.

        public boolean update()
        This method checks whether there is an Order ready
        Returns:
        boolean A boolean which is true when the update was successful. The boolean is false when there is no more time today.

        date A method that checks whether it is possible to schedule in an Order for today.

      • getDayorders

        protected java.util.LinkedList<Order> getDayorders()
        This method returns the list of orders that will probably be finished today. There might be delays or speedups that cause the list to shrink of grow.
        Returns:
        LinkedList A LinkedList with all the pending orders for today.
